gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.runtime.concurrent
Class QueueProcessor<T>

java.lang.Object
  gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.runtime.concurrent.QueueProcessor<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Type of objects in the queue.
All Implemented Interfaces:
LongProcess, LongProcessControl, LongProcessStatus, Runnable
public class QueueProcessor<T>
extends Object
implements Runnable, LongProcess

QueueProcessor is a Runnable object that pulls a queue with the input objects of a batch process and processes each of them in an atomic transaction. If processing fails, then the element is counted as a failure. If processing succeeds but a TransactionManagerException occurs, then the element is returned to the queue.

Constructor Detail

QueueProcessor

public QueueProcessor(Queue<T> inputQueue,
                      String streamname,
                      String name,
                      Operation operation,
                      String inputPropertyName,
                      Formatter<T> formatter,
                      Modification<Object> operationParametersSetter,
                      Boolean reattemptOnTmex)
Creates a new QueueProcessor object.

Parameters:
inputQueue - Queue with the inputs to be processed. If this queue processor is going to operate in a multi threaded environment, then this queue should be a thread safe queue.
streamname - Stream name.
name - Name of this QueueProcessor. The name is used to distinguish this QueueProcessor.
operation - Operation used by this QueueProcessor to process the elements in the queue.
The operation must have only one setter method that is used to set its input. I.e. the operation must take only one input that is set by the setter of the property specified with inputPropertyName
inputPropertyName - Name of the property of the operation class that describes the input.
formatter - Formatter used to create a string representation of each input object. The string representation is used for writing in the log file.
operationParametersSetter - Modification that will set any input parameters to the operation. Can be null, if the operation needs no additional parameters that the input fetched by the queue.
reattemptOnTmex - Indicates if rows for which a TransactionManagerException is caught are re-attempted.

isFinishedAbnormally

public boolean isFinishedAbnormally()
Description copied from interface: LongProcessStatus
Indicates that the process has quit while processing is still not finished. This could happen in the following cases:
  • The process was forced to quit.
  • Processing ended abnormally due to an exception.

    Specified by:
    isFinishedAbnormally in interface LongProcessStatus
    Returns:
    Returns true if processing has stopped abnormally.

    tidy

    public void tidy()
    Description copied from interface: LongProcessControl
    Tidy this long process. A LongProcess shouldn't need any tidying throughout it lifecycle. It should run for ages without any intervention. In real life things are not always perfect. This method is provided as a facility to the poor developer who can't have a perfect LongProcess. Put here whatever is necessary in order to keep the LongProcess running for long.

    Specified by:
    tidy in interface LongProcessControl
